name: ProSystem Emulator v1.3
body:
The ProSystem Emulator is an Atari 7800 emulator for the PC and Windows OS. The emulator was written in C++ using the Windows API and DirectX. It emulates the Atari 7800 NTSC and PAL TV standards.

[Download Prosystem v1.3](https://github.com/gstanton/ProSystem1_3/releases/download/v1.3/ProSystem_1_3.zip)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gstanton/ProSystem1_3/master/Web/images/Screenshot1.jpg)
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gstanton/ProSystem1_3/master/Web/images/Screenshot2.jpg)
